attr.title: Fire Arrow Plus
attr.desc: Fire Arrow and Fire Arrow X are time attack (or 'Caravan', what used to be an important tradition in Japanese STGs in the 90s) style shooters with a heavy emphasis on scoring, also known as "coffee break shmups"
attr.inst: Purchase from Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/509780/Fire_Arrow_Plus/ and copy the FA1 and FAX folders into the port folder (/ports/firearrow/).  The itch.io version's two zip files can be copied directly into the port folder - v2.7.17 has been tested working.  Additionally, you can copy the data.win and all .ogg files from each of these folders into the respective gamedata folders (/ports/firearrow/firearrow/gamedata/ & /ports/firearrow/firearrowx/gamedata/).
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/509780/Fire_Arrow_Plus/) and copy the FA1 and FAX folders into the port folder (/ports/firearrow/).  The itch.io version's two zip files can be copied directly into the port folder - v2.7.17 has been tested working.  Additionally, you can copy the data.win and all .ogg files from each of these folders into the respective gamedata folders (/ports/firearrow/firearrow/gamedata/ & /ports/firearrow/firearrowx/gamedata/).
